snippet: The Gunners, who needed to defeat A.C. Milan by four goals to reach the quarterfinals, fell just short with a 3-0 victory, missing the greatest comeback in Champions League history.
abstract: Arsenal soccer club defeats AC Milan, 3-0, falling one goal short of reaching the UEFA Champions League quarterfinals.
lead_paragraph: The Gunners, who needed to defeat A.C. Milan by four goals to reach the quarterfinals, fell just short with a 3-0 victory, missing the greatest comeback in Champions League history.

headline.seo: Arsenal’s Big Comeback Isn’t Enough to Advance
headline.main: Arsenal’s Comeback Isn’t Enough to Get Past A.C. Milan
headline.print_headline: Arsenal’s Comeback Isn’t Enough to Get Past A.C. Milan
